blogPost.excerpt: Pulls structured data from any website as easily as copy paste. Whether lists of people and companies from directories, search engines or any website, Clay already understands the web and automatically fills them in a spreadsheet for you. -Automated CRM-
blogPost.body: Pulls structured data from any website as easily as copy paste. Whether lists of people and companies from directories, search engines or any website, Clay already understands the web and automatically fills them in a spreadsheet for you. -Automated CRM-
blogPost.title: Clay - The spreadsheet that fills itself
blogPost.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 从任何网站上提取结构化数据，就像复制粘贴一样简单。无论是来自目录、搜索引擎还是任何网站的人员和公司名单，Clay都能理解网络，并为您自动将其填入电子表格。-自动CRM-
從任何網站上提取結構化數據，就像複製粘貼一樣簡單。無論是來自目錄、搜索引擎還是任何網站的人員和公司名單，Clay都能理解網絡，併爲您自動將其填入電子表格。-自動CRM-
